Message.En: Battle for Fort Gritten: Close Battle
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦　戦況：接戦

Message.En: The difficulty level has increased and it has become a large-scale combat with a greater sense of accomplishment. The number of strong enemy soldiers has also increased. However, if we apply our daily experience, it shouldn't be scary. Remember the basics and pay attention to your surroundings. It's all about coordination, discerning your comrades' movements.
Message.Jp:
多少難易度が上がり手ごたえの増した大規模戦闘だ
敵兵にも強い個体が増えてきている
だが日ごろの経験を生かして望めば怖くないはず
基本を忘れず周囲に気を配れ
仲間の動きを見極めてこその連係だ

Message.En:
Escort Lise and defeat the enemy
at the target locations
Message.Jp: リズを護衛し、目標地点の敵を殲滅せよ

Message.En:
An Ambush Unit has appeared,
offering a chance for a War Merit Bonus
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊が出現、戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered
and receive a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Lured out the main force of the ambush unit.
A chance for War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊の本隊を誘い出した。戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered
and receive a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Defeat the battalion commander
and complete the defense
Message.Jp: 大隊長を撃破し、防衛を完遂せよ

Message.En:
Battle for Fort Gritten: Close Battle
(Result Reward)
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦：接戦《リザルト報酬》

Message.En:
Take on the challenge of large-scale battles with increased difficulty.
With daily experience, even the strongest enemies are not to be feared.
Focus on cooperation with your friends.
Message.Jp:
難易度が増した大規模戦闘に挑め
日々の経験を生かせば、強敵も畏れることはない
仲間との連携に注力せよ
